item.title: Quick Gulp file to run php-unit tests
item.description: MUCH BETTER WAY HERE This is setup for Laravel but can work for any app. Most of this is due to the great Laracasts on Gulp Download and setup gulp First make a package.json file in the root of your app and just put curly brackets in it. touch package.json vim package.json //package.json { } Then run the needed node commands npm install -g gulp npm install gulp --save-dev npm install gulp-notify --save-dev npm install gulp-phpunit --save-dev Now the package.
